meanings.definition: To lease or rent (a property) to a subtenant.
meanings.sent1: I am subletting my apartment to a friend while I travel.
meanings.sent2: She is subletting her office space to a small startup company.
meanings.sent3: The idea of subletting my room to a cat for the weekend sounds funny.
meanings.sent4: Subletting my car to my brother felt like sharing a secret with him.
meanings.sent5: Subletting can be a great way to earn extra money while you are away.

meanings.definition: The act of subletting a property.
meanings.sent1: The subletting of the apartment was done smoothly.
meanings.sent2: He was involved in the subletting of the commercial building.
meanings.sent3: The subletting of the beach house for a party seemed like a good idea.
meanings.sent4: The subletting of the farm was like passing on a legacy.
meanings.sent5: The subletting process can sometimes require legal documentation.
